attributes.action: Add 'When Hitler Stole Pink Rabbit' by Judith Kerr to the National Curriculum
attributes.background: In tribute to Judith Kerr, and in recognition of the divisive politics of this era, I propose that the author's autobiographical account of her experiences as a refugee child in 1930s Europe be included on the national curriculum reading list.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the national curriculum doesn't specify which texts should be taught. This is a decision for the exam board and not the UK Government or Parliament.
